page.title: 05BRIDGE PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: Our school is called Bridge and Patrixbourne Church of England Primary School.It has six classes,two for infants aged 5 to 7, and four for juniors aged 8 to 11.There are 61 infants and 106 juniors.We have six teachers and a Headmaster.Our School Secretary works here every morning.The School Caretaker keeps our school tidy and clean.School dinners are cooked here for our school and Barham School. A taxi takes the dinners to Barham. There are 3 Cooks and 3 Dinner Ladies who look after us from 12 o'clock until 1.30pm. 167 children come to Bridge School. 77 come from Bridge,43 come from Bekesbourne,13 come from Canterbury, 12 come from Bishopsbourne,7 come from Patrixbourne and the rest come from Barham, Littlebourne, Lower and Upper Hardres,Adisham,Pett Bottom & Sturry.
